flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: A step-by-step guide to making a reusuable tote bag.
guide.introduction_rendered: A step-by-step guide to making a reusuable tote bag.
guide.summary: An 8-step guide to making a handy reusable tote which folds away into it's own pocket. Perfect for storing in your purse for spontaneous shopping sprees!
guide.title: Tutorial: foldaway market tote
